content.html: It doesn’t mean that we should enable them to tell racist, homophobic, transphobic etc jokes in the name of comedy. Ask yourselves why you think these jokes are funny and then you have your answer. It shouldn’t prevent us from calling out the problematic
content.value: It doesn’t mean that we should enable them to tell racist, homophobic, transphobic etc jokes in the name of comedy. Ask yourselves why you think these jokes are funny and then you have your answer. It shouldn’t prevent us from calling out the problematic
